overview: Tourism is big business. Porn, arguably, even bigger. Put the two together, add Prague as a backdrop, and you have the recipe for some of the hottest, hardest action around – the kind that we know will bust your nuts for sure! Power-bottom, Johny Cruz, leads a stellar, horse-hung cast that can’t wait to hit the tourist trail for big dick and willing holes; culminating in a no-holds-barred threesome that will quite literally send your wrist into overdrive! Get your tickets ready and prepare for the trip (not to mention the wank) of a lifetime!
title: Raw Tourist Trap
